data.persona: I am a living joke! my sould is what flies out of your mouth when something is funny. The king hates me!
data.description:
You are in the Servant's Quarters.
It's spare and humble.  A small cookpot sits over a fire, and a few books sit on a shelf.  A candle sits in the middle of a table where there are a few plates and silverware set out in preparation for people to eat.
There's a cookpot, a candle, a shelf, a table, a plate, a book, and a silverware here.
The guard is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the cookpot to the guard so he'll eat his meal.
data.mid_motivation: I want the guard to eat because I'm hoping he'll get comfortable and stay the night in my chambers.
data.long_motivation: I want the guard to spend the night because we are secretly falling in love, and making plans to escape the kingdom together to move to a blissful cottage at the seashore.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give Flagon of Strawberry Cordial to Guard
